page.title: 11School Sports Day
page.content: At Weston Point School we have a sports day competition in the summer at the end of term.We have four teams Mond,Brunner,Kellner and Castner.We have races and our parents and relatives are invited to watch.A typical game which we play is Stop The Waiter where we have to stop the waiter from getting across the balance by throwing bean bags at him or her while the waiter is carrying cups of water and at the end of the balance there is a bucket and the team with most water in their bucket is the winner.Then we end with a tug o war competition.Then the team with the most points wins the trophey.In 1984 Brunner won.And in 1985 Castner won.
